channel.title: Reasons why my gf is ace: our XMas tree
channel.description:
Hey folks, check out our Christmas tree:
[url=https://postimg.org/image/piu8o7a6d/][img]https://s18.postimg.org/piu8o7a6d/IMAG0727.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://postimg.org/image/c1s887tj9/][img]https://s18.postimg.org/c1s887tj9/IMAG0728.jpg[/img][/url]
That's it without lights turned on, for better pics (sorry they're all taken on my phone and I'm no photographer).
Do you see them yet? Let's have some close ups of some of the decorations, handmade by my girlfriend out of melted bead-thingies:
[url=https://postimg.org/image/5vqs1gzlx/][img]https://s18.postimg.org/5vqs1gzlx/IMAG0730.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=https://postimg.org/image/bu4lbpikl/][img]https://s18.postimg.org/bu4lbpikl/IMAG0731.jpg[/img][/url]

item.title: Reasons why my gf is ace: our XMas tree
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

where the fuck have you bean

I Have Always Bean Here.

Jack Freeman:

don’t go off-topic ramirezoid we’re talking about christmas trees here

Damn straight.

Ibanez:

i was about to be all “ugh good for you, you have a cool gf”

then i saw that it was raw_bean

i still think “ugh good for you, you have a cool gf”

Cool story bro. :freeman:

Keresh:

I don’t think you have a Christmas tree. Enjoy your girlfriend.

What is this I don’t even.

sersoft:

I thought it was a cardboard cutout then I noticed it was the plastic melted thingies.

Cool.

You should get a 3D printer to make your cristmas tree decorations even more realistic.

I’ll do that, just after I buy a helicopter to make my ten minute commute to work easier.

Read full topic
item.source: Reasons why my gf is ace: our XMas tree

item.title: Reasons why my gf is ace: our XMas tree
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Here are a couple made with our initials (she’s ‘K’, and obviously I’m ‘R’):

And the most recent couple she’s made:

Of all of these, the only two that were my idea were the Weighted Storage Cube with Aperture logo as a variation on the companion cube she’d already done, and the Black Mesa (Research Facility) logo.

Read full topic
